author: COMSOL
description: In this example, the External Stress feature is used to set up the material model with nonsymmetric stress required in the design of an elastic invisibility cloak. This is a device whose aim is to shield a region of space from both P and S waves.
label: elastic_cloaking.mph
name: root

settings.description: Show or hide all physics symbols
settings.name: physicsSymbolButtons
